title: Things to Do in Orlando | Theme Parks, Attractions & Activities
text: What’s New No matter how many times you have been to Orlando, you will always be amazed by fresh can’t-miss experiences the next time you come to town. Your browser is not supported for this experience. We recommend using Chrome, Firefox, Edge, or Safari. Orlando is the perfect destination thanks to wondrous diversity that ensures unforgettable vacations with unique experiences for everyone. Whether it is a trip for families, couples, single travelers or a group of friends, you will never run out of things to do in Orlando — and make a lifetime of memories to cherish. No matter how many times you have been to Orlando, you will always be amazed by fresh can’t-miss experiences the next time you come to town. Sure, Orlando is the Theme Park Capital of the World. But the parks are just the start of everything our vibrant, welcoming destination has to offer. Yes, starting with our world-famous theme parks and continuing through all the other things there are to do here. In fact, it would take more than 121 days to fully experience all of Orlando’s unforgettable experiences. ExploreYes. In addition to standalone attractions, you can enjoy award-winning dining, world-class arts, authentic neighborhoods, outdoor adventures for all ages and interests, live sports, concerts, nightlife, and much more in Orlando. ExploreTwo days in Orlando is plenty of time to enjoy a theme park or two. Fill out your itinerary with acclaimed dining, live music and performing arts, professional sports, neighborhood exploration and more. Orlando’s standalone attractions are perfect for filling a few hours. Most are in our International Drive Entertainment District (I-Drive), but you will find more throughout the destination. ExploreOrlando has things to do for any budget, including free things to do and 30+ things to do for $30 or less. You can save even more with special offers and authorized discount theme park and attraction tickets from Visit Orlando powered by BestofOrlando.com. As the Theme Park Capital of the World, Orlando is best known for its theme parks. However, it is also a go-to destination for culinary tourism, outdoor adventures, concerts, live sports, vibrant arts and much more — not to mention year-round sunny skies. You will never run out of one-of-a-kind adventures in Orlando. See what else is waiting to amaze you.
